description:
This Harajuku was a fantasy. Rito and her friends are deeply shocked to hear the truth. The people who complimented Rito`s drawings, their customers, and even Sayumi? Unable to understand why the girls are frozen in place with all the blood drained from their faces, Misa is at a loss. If it`s not the real world, then it`s meaningless. But the four of them realize there were real things even within the fake world. Meanwhile, the agitated Ebifurya becomes even more openly hostile...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エビフライランナウェイ
